title: Strange Days
plot: In 1999, Los Angeles is racial war zone with the army and LSPD and SWAT officers fighting Afro-American people. The former cop Lenny Nero is a dealer of illegal recording in CDs that gives the memories and sensations of the recorder to the user. He buys the recordings from the supplier Tick; he misses his former mistress Faith, who was a hooker and now is a singer; his best friend is the private eye Max Peltier and the limousine driver Lornette 'Mace' Mason, who has unrequited love for him. Two days before the turn of the century, the black rapper Jeriko One is murdered. The hooker Iris seeks Lenny out but there is an incident and they do not talk to each other. However she drops a recording into Lenny's car while he unsuccessfully tries to meet Faith at a night-club. However her boyfriend Philo Gant does not let them talk. When Lenny learns that Iris was sadistically raped and killed, he gets involved in a sick scheme and discovers dirty hidden secrets.
stars: Ralph Fiennes, Angela Bassett, Juliette Lewis, Tom Sizemore

similars.title: Near Dark
similars.plot: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.
similars.stars: Adrian Pasdar, Jenny Wright, Lance Henriksen

similars.title: Blue Steel
similars.plot: A rookie in the police force must engage in a cat-and-mouse game with a pistol-wielding psychopath who becomes obsessed with her.
similars.stars: Jamie Lee Curtis, Ron Silver, Clancy Brown

similars.title: Dark City
similars.plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, which includes a wife he cannot remember, and a nightmarish world, no one else seems to be waking up from.
similars.stars: Rufus Sewell, Kiefer Sutherland, Jennifer Connelly

similars.title: Point Break
similars.plot: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.
similars.stars: Patrick Swayze, Keanu Reeves, Gary Busey

similars.title: eXistenZ
similars.plot: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.
similars.stars: Jude Law, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Ian Holm

similars.title: Johnny Mnemonic
similars.plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.
similars.stars: Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren, Dina Meyer

similars.title: The Weight of Water
similars.plot: A newspaper photographer researches an 1873 double homicide and finds her own life paralleling that of a witness who survived the tragic ordeal.
similars.stars: Catherine McCormack, Sean Penn, Sarah Polley

similars.title: The Loveless
similars.plot: Trouble ensues when a motorcycle gang stops in a small southern town while heading to the races at Daytona.
similars.stars: Willem Dafoe, J. Don Ferguson, Robert Gordon

similars.title: The Crow
similars.plot: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.
similars.stars: Brandon Lee, Michael Wincott, Rochelle Davis

similars.title: Bound
similars.plot: Corky, a tough female ex con and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.
similars.stars: Jennifer Tilly, Gina Gershon, Joe Pantoliano

similars.title: A Simple Plan
similars.plot: Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.
similars.stars: Bill Paxton, Billy Bob Thornton, Bridget Fonda

similars.title: The Abyss
similars.plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.
similars.stars: Ed Harris, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Michael Biehn
